body.name: aeac Smart Watch, 2024 Newest Fitness Watch for Men Women, Alexa Built-in & Stable Bluetooth Call, with Heart Rate/SpO2/Sleep Monitor, 100 Sports, IP68 Waterproof Smartwatches for iOS Android
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 9 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Climate neutral by ClimatePartner certifies the carbon footprint of a product was calculated and all associated emissions were offset.

features: 📞 【Bluetooth Call and Message Reminder】 This smart watch is equipped with speaker and bluetooth connectivity, you can directly make or receive calls with your family and friends via the smartwatch, also it supports multiple smart reminders, including incoming calls, text, SNS messages (Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, etc), daily reminder, etc, extremely convenient for your life and you will never miss any important information.

⌚ 【Alexa Built-in】The smart watch built-in Alexa Voice Assistant. Use your voice to control the built-in Alexa in your smartwatch to control the music playback, ask questions, read the news and get information, check the weather, set alarms, control compatible smart home devices, and more. It makes things on your wrist simple and easy, and will always work as your effective daily assistant.

🩺 【Heart Rate/SpO2/Stress/Sleep Monitor】 The smartwatch has advanced sensors that help you detect 24-hour continuity real-time Heart Rate, Blood Oxygen (Sp02), Stress and Sleep Monitoring(Deep/light sleep). All recorded data can be synced to your phone for analysis, providing valuable insights into your health and facilitating lifestyle adjustments.

🏃 【100+ Sports Modes and IP68 Waterproof】 The smart watch provides 100+ exercise modes, such as running, yoga, jumping jack, sit-ups, etc. During your exercise, it will record your data like heart rate, steps, calories burned, distance and active hours in real time. The fitness tracker is IP68 waterproof so you can wear it during outdoor activities, rainy days, washing hands.

💡 【Long Battery Life and Multi-Functions】 Smart watches for men women have a built-in large capacity battery, which can be fully charged in 2 hours, can be used for up to 7 days and has a long standby time of about 30 days. Smart watches and "VeryFit" apps have many practical tools, such as weather forecasts, stopwatch, timer, music control/ play, adjustable brightness, find phone/ watch, breathing training, smart alarm clock, camera control, women health, sedentary reminder, ect.

🌈 【1.8'' Full Touch HD Screen & 100 Dials】 Smart watches feature a 1.8'' full touch HD color screen, which can provide excellent picture quality, with 100 dials to choose from, and you can also select your favorite photo as a dial in the smart watches.

💖 【Wide Compatibility & 3-Year Warranty Promised】 The fitness watch works seamlessly with iOS or Android smartphones (Compatible with iOS 9.0 or above, Android 6.0 or above). And We always stand by our product and promise 3-Year warranty & 24/7 lifetime tech support for your hassle-free purchase. Please feel free to reach us for any problem you encounter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Low price for a smart watch. This watch reminds me to move around---100 steps every hour when I sit too long. It has many other fitness prompts you can use. The watch face can be changed easily. Sleep, heart health, timers, stop watch, etc

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great watch, Disappointing app
reviews.reviewText: I had a Fitbit for years, but switched to this watch because I wanted the smart watch look with only basic features (no bells and whistles). This watch looks great and works well, all things considered. However, the app is very underdeveloped and is unreliable with syncing and storing data if you specifically want to use it for tracking workouts. For those reasons, I went back to Fitbit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great smart watch and awesome app.
reviews.reviewText: When I buy a smart watch, there are certain things (features & functions) that I always look for. I do not care much for the accuracy of heart beat rate, SPO2...etc because I fully understand that these economic types (under $50) watches does not really provide accurate data. So as long as those data are somewhat accurate and useful enough, I am fine with it.for me, the most important things are the following : a lot of useful watch faces that I can download and switch back and forth, thru the watch, not via app.Tennis fitness app (I am a tennis coach) among other useful (at least for me) sport apps. very loud alarm and timer, so that it can wake me up. 44mm and up big size watch for my 7.4 inch wrist. Large battery....etcAs for watch faces, it has a lot. A lot of good ones that I can use. Also, I can delete pre-installed all the watch faces and upload with all new ones. Many other lower cost smart watches do not have this feature. I can only upload one or two that I like and I have to keep the pre-installed faces which I can not delete nor replace. As for this watch, Yes, you can basically delete all the pre-installed faces with your choice of watch faces, up to 8 of them.As for the battery life, it claims that it has 300 mAh. That is pretty big size and I think that it will last for few days.It also has a lot of fitness choices. More than 100 of them and I think that most of us can really choose what we like. Also, the app (Veryfit) can allow the watch to upload only the fitness apps that we are willing to use. Veryfit app is a very useful and well designed app for lower end watches.And the feature that I like the most is the alarm and timer. Most of watches, including expensive ones costing over $100 or more, only comes with weak vibration for alarm and timer. But this one has the "real alarm" sound. Not vibration, but the piercing & loud sound that will really wake you up. I had a lot of smart and fitness tracker watches, but this one is the only one that has the actual alarm sound coming out of the watch speaker. I really like this feature.This is big size enough for my wrist and the screen quality isn't so bad either. It is not amoled screen, but you really can not expect amoled for this price. However, screen is very nice and it is bright enough.I guess that the only draw back that this watch has is the strap. You can not really change to different strap because it has its own proprietary lug designs (as you can see from the photo). However, the strap is nice and soft and comfortable though...It comes with a very simple and cheap looking gift box and inner plastic container (which even looks cheaper) but as long as the watch works and it works great for me, I do not mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Band defect....New one I received 11-27, charger doesn't work
reviews.reviewText: The band came with the locking clasp reversed. Took it to a jeweler who thought it would be easy to pop the pin and correct the issue…it was not. The pins are not spring loaded, they are a solid steel piece. Anyway he was able to use plyers and manipulate the black hooking clasp under the latch and get it facing the correct way. Unfortunately I had to pay $10.60 for this repair. All in all the watch itself is very nice and has worked great the past few days I’ve been able to wear it. For the price it is an excellent value but I am concerned that the band, latch, and clip having to be manipulated will wear down quicker than they should.This is an add on to my first review. I had to order a second watch because the first just stopped working...I received the new one and set it up but the charger that came with it will not work so within 3 days the watch is dead and I have no way of recharging it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my triathlon training and it’s a great watch for tracking distance and swimming! It does have a function where u can’t track how far u bike tho (at least it never works for me) I’ve tried multiple times but it stops tracking if u try to use the gps function.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I found this watch to provide accurate readings & be comfortable to wear. The watch face is easily customizable in the app & I love the alarm feature. My biggest & really only complaint is I have had no luck finding new bands to fit... I asked the company & they said to just search the watch face size, the pin release was not in the right space or the band was too thick to fit on the watch. This has been very frustrating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Long battery life! Easy to read and navigate.

I bought this smart watch awhile ago but waited to wriite a review..I am not very tec savey... yet found this easy to set up, easy to use and it has motivated my runs..and keeps me within my heart beat max beats per minute..I am 66 and started running again, I ordered the watch because I felt I may have been working my heart to hard..I started getting heart papitations throughout the day after running..Well I feel much better now with the help of this watch..I would buy it again. Great Price..Great Watch.. Its now been almost a year, still works well, I had an issue with cycle mode and not accurate distance recorded, but once I put my phone on my bike it is almost as accurate according to the distsnce recorder I had installed on my bicycle..this little watch is well worth it, as it is not hundreds of dollars, I would buy again and would recommend it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Goed alternatief voor de dure smartwatches
reviews.reviewText: Positieve punten:- Vele apps- Meldingen en bellen ok- Batterij gaat lang mee- Laadt snel op- Kleur polsband mooi zoals op de fotoNegatieve punten:- Scherm te groot- Je kan niet reageren op berichten

Orologio molto bello e funzionale, tante funzioni e quadranti da poter cambiare, si può impostare anche una foto propria sul quadrante, si ricevono e si possono fare telefonate, si può rispondere e si ricevono anche le varie notifiche.Connessione al tel fantastica.Molto consigliato super soddisfatta e prezzo ottimo
Diese smart watch ist leicht zu bedienen, sieht gut aus und hat einen stabilen Akku.

reviews.reviewTitle: Orologio Smart senza troppi fronzoli e pretese...fa quello che lo paghi!!!
reviews.reviewText: Prodotto comodo per utilizzo NON professionale; i dati che fornisce per pressione e saturazione sono leggermente inferiori a dati paragonati a strumenti medici, ma per uso non medico, ma meramente informativo, sufficienti a dare riscontro ad una informazione di massima; comodo il menù per la gestione di musica in remoto e discreta la selezione di sfondi (gratis); ottima la tenuta del cinturino intercambiabile e l'estetica piacevole; sufficientemente robusto anche in caso di contatto accidentale del display con superfici dure, non si graffia facilmente; per ora dopo qualche mese di utilizzo voto più che sufficiente nell'insieme
